data.text: @TheSheepdogs We’re sitting in our hotel room getting ready for a pre-gig dinner. Never mind guys, hope you’re all well soon. It’s not been a wasted trip though, popped into Rough Trade earlier and bought a few albums. I feel for @theklabristol as well as we wanted to support a small venue.
@TheSheepdogs Sorry to hear this. 😢 Wishing all you guys well. 🙏🏻
@TheSheepdogs Catch up guys, here in the UK covid is soooo yesterday….. unless Putin bombed your equipment you should play the gig.
@TheSheepdogs Gutted, but stay safe all and hopefully see you again in the future

@TheSheepdogs Damn, I wish this was the response back on 10/30/2015 when yall canceled the show like 6 hours prior for no explained reason in Baltimore. Never came back to make it up

Feel better whoever sick tho
